definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Shen Kuo, a famous scientist of Song Dynasty of ancient China, detected a change of rate of the water clock.
sentences.chinese: 宋代著名的科學家沈括發現了一種漏壺的遲疾現象。

sentences.english: If you wish to fill the clepsydra more quickly, hold down the mouse button.
sentences.chinese: 如果你希望更快的注滿漏壺，按住你的鼠標鍵。

sentences.english: This method of measuring time through clepsydra was still not accurate.
sentences.chinese: 這種漏壺計時的準確性仍然比較差。
